team.name: Imran Ali
team.description: A qualified Prince II Practitioner who has minimum 10 years’ experience in a senior management role with both external audit and in-house financial management experience gained in high-growth organisations including Citibank, National Health Service and UK and foreign government institutions.

team.name: Dr. Priyantha Wijesooriya
team.description: Dr.Priyantha Wijesooriya is a US and Sri Lanka trained energy engineer (BSc and MS in Energy Engineering, PhD in Resource Economics & Inter-generational Equities). He is a Rotary Foundation Scholar to the University of Massachusetts and has been pioneering Renewable Energy Projects and Sustainable Development for years.

team.name: Carbon Consulting Company
team.description: The Carbon Consulting Company is one of South Asia's leading provider of Corporate Sustainability Advisory Services. Initially the company was set up by a team of 'green visionaries' to bring the concept of Carbon Footprinting and offsetting into the local marketplace. The company has expanded into many other aspects of environmental sustainability, Water Footprinting , Bio-diversity Assessment and Waste Management to name a few. CCC operations have expanded regionally and internationally to encompass The Maldives and India as well as other continents - paving the way for CCC to take an international role in sustainability advocacy.

team.name: Mohan Munasinghe
team.description:
• Former Vice-Chair of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC), which shared the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize with former Vice-President of the United States Al Gore.
• Founder Chairman of the Munasinghe Institute for Development (MInD) and MInD Group.
• Professor of Sustainable Development Studies at various international universities including the University of Manchester, Peking University and Federal University Brazil, and is a Senior Advisor to the Government of Sri Lanka and formerly the US Government.

team.name: Sanith de Silva Wijeyeratne
team.description: After assuming responsibility for the overall management and strategic direction of the company Sanith has guided the company to not only become the most recognised provider of carbon assessment, mitigation and offset solutions, but also to become known for its expertise in a diverse array of sustainability solutions.

team.name: Sajid Salih
team.description: Having past experience in corporate finance, project management, eCommerce and mobile platforms with startups since 2016.

team.name: Prof. Rahula Attallage
team.description: Prof. Rahula Attallage holds a PhD in Energy Engineering from Ecole Nationale Superieure des Mines de Paris, France. He has worked as a Senior Professor in Mechanical Engineering in the Dept. of Mechanical Engineering, University of Moratuwa. Prof. Attalage has been awarded the Outstanding Research Award and Presidential Awards for Scientific Publications multiple times. His latest achievement is an Honorary Distinction of 'Order of the Academic Palms' award by the Government of France.

team.name: Iftikhar Bokhari
team.description: Over 25 years of experience in project management and a recognized track record of delivering multi million pound contracts for urban regeneration and project engineering within the UK. Specializing in energy from waste systems, integration of renewable technologies for domestic and commercial applications, research and strategic planning.

team.name: Dr. Graham Walwyn
team.description: Senior Project Engineer - specializing in electrical design, costing and procurement. Worked on a range of multi million pound developments which range from medical, commercial and domestic systems. Also specializing in the design,installation and maintenance of renewable energy technology.

team.name: Prof. Waqar Ahmed
team.description: Over 30 years of industrial and academic experience in engineering and science. Leads the Experimental Nano physics Group focusing on Renewable Energy Technology and Sustainability. Accredited with over 500 publications on a range of engineering and science journals and has worked across many projects throughout Europe, Middle East, USA and Asia.

team.name: Bart Baker
team.description: Bart Baker is the No.1 American influencer in all of China with over 40M followers worldwide and over 25 million followers in China across Douyin, Kuaishou, and Weibo. In the United States Bart also has over 16M followers with 10M on his YouTube alone.   Baker has been involved in the crypto space since 2018 and he helped Brave get over 1 million downloads of its web browser.   He also has contacts in media worldwide and is helping SavePlanetEarth reach widespread awareness.

team.name: Aaron Bernhardt
team.description: Full-stack engineer with experience in JavaScript - jQuery, bootstrap, and Infragistics, HTML, C#/ASP.NET - MVC architecture, LINQ library, building models, controllers, and views using the above languages; Dependency Injection, Entity Framework SQL (T-SQL). Python.
